title: I’m an Old Man but Also a Saint? - Novel Updates
tags: Demons   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Knights   Saints   Younger Love Interests
author: 桃瀬 わさび
description:
He’s an old man but also a saint. [You don’t know what you’re talking about and I don’t know what you mean!]

Zeph has never left the poor, remote village he was raised in. One day, a finely dressed Temple Knight comes to his village. He says he’s looking for the saint who has been missing for years, and everyone will be appraised, but the result is unexpected!

A story about a tired old man who became a saint by chance and a beautiful knight who is swayed by the old man. >
